task: Implement user name system with StudentVUE override
description: Add user name handling to Gradely with a fallback system: collect name at signup, allow manual editing in User Profile, and automatically replace it with the legal name from StudentVUE once a gradebook is linked.
objectives: Add a full name field (first + last, or display name) to the Gradely signup page
Persist the signup name in Gradely user profile storage
Allow the user to view and edit their name in the User / Student Info page
When a StudentVUE account is linked, automatically pull the legal name from StudentVUE
Override the display name with the StudentVUE legal name once linked
Keep the signup name as a fallback if StudentVUE is not linked or name is unavailable
ui_requirements: Keep the existing Gradely login/signup page style exactly the same
Add name input without redesigning layout
Show name in User / Student Info page with clear edit capability
Indicate when name is sourced from StudentVUE (read-only or labeled)

do_not: Require StudentVUE to create a Gradely account

definition_of_done: User is asked for their name during Gradely signup
Name persists across refresh and login
User can edit name before StudentVUE is linked
StudentVUE legal name replaces display name once linked
Fallback name is used if StudentVUE is not linked
